name: Not a card tower
description:
It's your first day on a new job. Your task: build a tower.

Your company is running out of space, you have to fit all items in a small area. The only way to do this is by making a tower. Try not to make your tower too fragile, or it will fall.

Use your mouse to place the objects, right mouse button to rotate items.

Thanks for playing this little game. If you came here from the jam, please don't forget to rate.

Made in 3-ish days for the Goedware Game Jam #2 by Jael137and SleepyUFO. Read the devlog here!
